content.rendered:
At VINCI Construction, we are convinced that success is inseparable from personal ambition and ambitious projects, so we see innovation as driving our growth as a company and accelerating our success. That’s why we launched the student challenge we call The Trail by VINCI Construction.

This international competition was run in two phases, one at the end of 2017 and the other in spring 2018: 

– an online creativity and innovation challenge to “Envision tomorrow’s construction world”

– an open-air sporting challenge on 17 and 18 May 2018 for competitors nominated on a national basis You can find more details at http://www.agorize.com/fr/challenges/thetrail

excerpt.rendered: Students: it’s your turn to envision the construction industry of tomorrow!
